document_data.name: Shrine to Malar
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shrine to Malar''', was a small temple dedicated to the worship of [[Malar]], the Beastlord, located in the city of [[Suzail]], the capital of [[Cormyr]], the Forest Kingdom.
document_data.Location: The [[Malarite]] shrine was located on the [[Royal Ride]],{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20220313034753/https://candlekeep.com/library/articles/sse/sse_080910-04.htm| title = So Saith Ed Aug â€“ Oct 2004 | accessdate = 13-04-2021| date = 13-04-2021}} across from the [[Thistleflame Manor]], two doors east from the bridge crossing the [[Jaws (Suzail)|Jaws]] of [[Lake Azoun]], south-east of [[Wyvernspur House]]. The [[Shrine to Tyr (Suzail)|Shrine to Tyr]] and the [[Shrine of Tempus (Suzail)|Shrine of Tempus]] stood on the same side of the Royal Ride, two doors east of the Shrine to Malar.
